title: Array Methods Practice
description: Practice using JavaScript array methods like map, filter, and reduce to transform and manipulate arrays.
instructions:
Complete the following functions using the appropriate array methods:

1. `doubleNumbers` - Double each number in the array
2. `filterEvenNumbers` - Return only even numbers
3. `sumNumbers` - Calculate the sum of all numbers

testCases.description: filterEvenNumbers should return only even numbers
sumNumbers should return the sum of all numbers

hints: Use the map() method to transform each element in an array
Use the filter() method to select elements that meet a condition
Use the reduce() method to accumulate values into a single result
